title: Intro to modular electronic blocks (Project POCKIT)

media:group.media:title: Intro to modular electronic blocks (Project POCKIT)
media:group.media:description:
More details + signup at https://pockit.ai
Join the discussion at https://facebook.com/groups/pockit
This video introduces the concept of POCKIT, with an example demo of an alarm-clock build, then a summary of the modular-blocks story, and finally ending with an e-paper version of a clock/BitCoin-ticker/notifier.
